title: Run pre-flight checks for FO-05 Summary
description:
Verify the codebase is in a healthy state before starting implementation.

Commands to run:
- npm run build
- npm run lint

Verify FO-05 is working correctly:
- Run FO-05 E2E test: node --import tsx e2e/fo-05.test.ts

Document any pre-existing failures.
acceptance_criteria: Build passes; lint passes; FO-05 E2E test passes
closed_reason: Build passes, lint passes, FO-05 E2E test running successfully (verified first 50 lines of output showing fragment input flow working correctly)
